plot outline: Nancy is a young girl from a small port town falls in love with the Captain of a visiting ship, who dismisses her interest as an infatuation and goes away, but promises to come back in a year. Marudhu, a young sailor who visits the town is attracted to Nancy who is still waiting for the Captain after a few years.
title: Iyarkai
plot: A young girl from a port town is waiting for a sailor, and wooed by another.

Nancy is a young girl from a small port town falls in love with the Captain of a visiting ship, who dismisses her interest as an infatuation and goes away, but promises to come back in a year. Marudhu, a young sailor who visits the town is attracted to Nancy who is still waiting for the Captain after a few years.::Pari
